WorkflowInfo.Name: LogicMonitor (AppPool Alert Remediation)
WorkflowInfo.Details: <SequentialWorkflowActivity xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" x:Name="CustomWorkflow" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:05:00" TimeInSeconds="300" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="SN Create Record" received that Application Pool &quot;%instance%&quot; is stopped on host &quot;%host%&quot;." /><Settings Urgency="2" /><Settings Caller="Ayehu NG User" /><Settings _State="1" /></Settings>" application pool's status" notes="" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity2" activityLicenseType="1" id="429" name="IfElseActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False"
